website_summaries.verdict: These sandals offer a rugged, sporty charm of their own.
pros: Comes in hazel black (Zappos and Amazon), black and Celtic aqua (Zappos)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so incredibly comfortable and light! Plus, they got here earlier than they said.
customer_reviews.author: Chiazo

customer_reviews.title: ) and these tevas feel amazing the first time out
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8 and ordered size 8. I deal with fallen arches all the time, every toe broken at least once in my life, have ugly feet to say the least, (covered with tick and chigger bites too!) and these tevas feel amazing the first time out :) the three way adjustment straps allowed a perfect fit! I took my dog for a walk with some running over rocks and steep trails with no problem and amazing comfort. After walking in water my foot slipped around in the sandal a bit because I don't wear them tight and keep coconut oil on my feet but the amazing footbed kept my feet stable enough.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaM

customer_reviews.title: I needed sandals I could walk a good ways in
customer_reviews.text: I needed sandals I could walk a good ways in, and tried a lot before I settled on these. And they've been great. I haven't walked on trails in them, but they took me through a two-day street festival in which I walked several miles, and my feet and legs never hurt. I feel they have pretty good arch support. I took off a star because the straps are stiff and could rub blisters, although they haven't on me yet. I wear a 9.5-10 shoe, and tried these in both a 9 and 10, and settled on the 9 as the best fit for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Always my first choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! This particular version (Hurricane XLT) has pretty good arch support for a high arch so fits my needs. Since it is snowing in CO and I just had new carpet installed I decided that my home would now be a 'no-shoes-in-the-house' home. As these have no dirt, bacteria, etc. on them they are currently my house shoes! Later will wear them outside and get another pair for inside only. I like these better than slippers which can get nasty after awhile or just socks which have no arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand for their comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand for their comfort, but hate most of their strap designs. This one seemed the most classy of the options, and indeed the black/white rose design is pretty understated. The sandals are as comfortable as i expect from the brand. This has a thicker sole than I'm used to. On the one hand it provides a little more support than previous ones I've owned. On the other, the extra weight is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for lots of walking!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a trip where we will be doing quite a lot of walking each day, and I wanted something to wear besides walking shoes.These are comfortable, all three straps adjust to fit your foot, and when adjusted so they are snug but not tight, the sandals are very comfortable and GREAT for walking distances!!! They are well made, and look like they will wear well. Very happy with my purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Carol Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Fit, fashion and price - a Trifecta!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Developed a toe issue and couldn't wear anything closed for six months. An amazing alternative to sneakers for walking even long-distances. I wear them to the gym where open toes aren't technically allowed but hey, I'm not going to stop working out while this toe heals - that's crazy! And, even with a sneaker if I drop a weight on my foot - it's going to be a problem so whatever gym rule-makers. Easy on and off, easy to rinse off to clean, attractive and so, so, so much less expensive than in brick and mortar retail stores!
customer_reviews.author: PVJ

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tevas! If only I knew how to pronounce them, they would be absolutely perfect! ;-) I like to wear mine for casual hikes, outdoor activities, getting my feet wet, etc. The Velcro is very strong, and the shoes are super comfy-- no blisters! I have been wearing Tevas for close to a decade now-- when my first pair finally gave up the ghost a couple years ago, I got my second pair, and they work just as great as the first set.
customer_reviews.author: green_canary

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for these to grow on my wife. She likes​ the more feminine pretty sandals. I prefer these, and she finally came around after wearing them a bit. They have nice thick soles and comfortable straps. They really look good on her feet too. We are avid backpackers and these have held up well on many trips.
customer_reviews.author: Dookie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure sandal for outdoor activities!
customer_reviews.text: Best sandal for outdoors! I bought this sandal to walk to lake and use kayaking. I know with these that I can use them in water and dry land. It's very hilly in our area and I know that my feet will stay secure because of the back ankle strap. I have other sandals without the back strap but those can be hazardous when going up hills, getting wet, or carrying kayak. They feel great and wear all day without any discomfort. I need arch support because of my knees and these are great! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ShellH

customer_reviews.title: No padding...
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a replacement for my Avia sandals that finally wore out after four years. Unfortunately they aren't as good. They fit well but there's no padding where the straps meet and after only a few minutes they begin to hurt and rub my feet raw. I only bought this brand because I couldn't find any Avia brands sandals like the ones I had previously. Overall they're good for SHORT walks but not good as hiking sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll not have any other sandal. These Teva's are the most comfortable shoes that I've ever had. They can be worn in the water or hiking on the trail. They replaced my old Teva's because the old ones were faded and the sols were indented after years of wear. They never wore the sole off. The only thing about wearing them, day after day, is that when I went to bed, they felt like they were still on. And I wish they made them in the color white so I could wear them to church in the summer time with light colors. Very versatile shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relatively comfortable and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Positive word-of-mouth about how remarkable these sandals were inspired me to purchase a pair of my own. I do enjoy wearing them, they comfortably contain my heels instead of squishing or chafing my toes, and they are basically both water repellent and durable. However, wide rubber soles make them a little too slippery for walking long distances or navigating slippery embankments on a regular basis. Also, Velcro on the straps means I have to be sure to keep the sandals away from dog hair and excessive gunk. Despite these character flaws, I am content with these sandals for what is left of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: I was quite concerned about replacing them as I have a wide foot and they were so very comfortable and provided great support
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old Tevas recently died. I was quite concerned about replacing them as I have a wide foot and they were so very comfortable and provided great support. I am so very pleased with these. They fit my wide foot perfectly and offer so much support. They'll be perfect for kayaking when I have to step into the water, perfect for gardening when I can just hose them off. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: dml29ed

customer_reviews.title: Good basic tevas, great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Need a good pair of teva sandals and these are a great value for the price. Fit well right out of the box and no break in period. Wore them for three days straight on a vacation weekend where there was a lot of city walking on cobblestones and they were a dream. They are light, have good treads and in black go with just about everything in my wardrobe. Note these are not heavy river Tevas, but I didn't buy them for that use. These are great vacation, light hiking and city walking Tevas. I plan to take them on many vacations to come. Even good with a casual skirt.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 1/2 and went with the 9 as suggested. I have a narrow heel, and when I tightened the back strap to fit, my toes ended up right at the front edge. I love Teva's but they no longer make the style I've had in the past, and these looked the closest. They're still a little uncomfortable, but I'm sure once broke in I'll be 100% happy. They're going camping/hiking with me this weekend so that will be the test.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Avant

customer_reviews.title: Love my Tevas
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite summer shoes. I need a better arch support, but I can wear these for most of the day without a problem. They are bouncy and stay where you put them. Two issues: they tend to gather road dust and between that and the rubber, my feet can sweat in them on occasion. Also, they are NOT the most attractive look with shorter pants for anyone who has thick ankles, like I do. I prefer the way they look with straight leg pants but YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Teva quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because Teva discontinued the style I had worn for years. It looks the same but the sole was slightly different. Also different was the size. The originals were 6 and fit great. I first ordered the six which was a half inch shorter than the previous model. I ordered this and it is not only longer but also wider. I wish Teva made a half-size which would probably be perfect, or wish their styles were consistently sized. Nothing beats the comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Large cumbersome paddle-like
customer_reviews.text: Its ok if you are white river rafting or on lava rock but the shoes are paddle-like and the rubber shoe part extends 1/4" beyond the straps making them wider. Chacos is supportive and I found to be comfortable but the straps are tight. I wanted to try other brands on Amazon but did not want to end up returning. I wear 9 now and the 7 was still too big.
customer_reviews.author: RICH DOG POOR DOG

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing a pair of Teva sandals that I have loved for at least 7-8 years. They were terrific for vacations that involved wet landings from zodiacs and canoes, and for my job as a docent at a zoo that requires a lot of walking, some of it in rainy weather. I wore them almost constantly during the warmer months, and I finally wore them out. This model is the closest replacement I could find, and I expect them to be as consistently excellent as my former favorites. Comfortable, durable and modestly stylish - and waterproof as well. Amazon's price was pretty good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with support
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with one of my feet, and my physical therapist recommended that if I needed to wear a sandal to get some with support at the back and in the arch, and I chose this style Teva due to the great reviews I saw. Although expensive (for me anyway), these fit the bill perfectly. I read that sizes run a bit larger, I usually wear an 8 1/2, so I bought the 8 and they are fine. Every strap is velcro-adjustable for a custom fit. I have worn them all day without a problem. Overall I am happy with these, I expect them to last a long time-
customer_reviews.author: Cruise Lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these and I have 3 pair in different colors. I wear them everyday. I walk 3 miles each weekday morning before work then all day at work and when I get home my feet don't hurt. I wish they made close toed ones this comfortable for winter. I wear these until it starts raining.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Wilferd

customer_reviews.title: Great Company, this one is just not their norm.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors though the shoe is way too wide. Other styles and I have plenty don't have a wide edge style. I have a difficult time walking and that 1/2" on each shoe causes tripping so they have had to be retired. This style needs to be redone for safety & look. Wish it showed how wide it truly is on the picture or in the discription.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite warm weather shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Tevas as I had read they are good for hiking in addition to casual wear. I have been wearing them to walk up and down the hills in my town and they have kept up with me! I think they are cute and wear them with shorts and jeans. They are a little bit wide in the front and the straps are kind of sporty, so I would not suggest wearing them to a business casual setting. I am considering getting an additional pair of Tevas that is more femme and stylish in black color with thinner straps so I could sneak it as office wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Having owned TEVAs before, I was so happy to get my replacement pair...and to find that these are even better than expected! Fit is spot on, which is nice because I have wide feet, but I don't spill over the foot bed. And this is the truest sport sandal I think I've ever owned. Foot bed is comfortable but offers the support I'm going to need for trails and walking through water. Straps keep shoe secure yet are comfortable. At the time I was sad to say goodbye to my old pair, but these are above and beyond. Thanks TEVA for consistent awesomeness.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cox

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Teva sandals and the Hurricane XLT is no exception. I have a narrow heel and wide foot so the ability to adjust the front and back straps are really helpful. The shoe is so comfortable and sturdy. I can just as easily wear this shoe shipping as on the beach. For me, the size nine is perfect and runs true to size. The buckle on the little toe can cause a bit of initial soreness but that didn't even turn into a blister, it just rubbed slightly the first day and by the second I no longer noticed. Excellently made and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Shoes that Last!
customer_reviews.text: After 12 years my Teva shoes gave out. I was happy to see that Teva still makes these wonderful shoes and found the best price on line at Amazon. These are wonderful shoes for the beach, rafting and other sport activities and well worth the price. Attesting to Teva's quality, my first pair lasted 12 years. One wonderful feature are the 3 velcro openings, one at the toes and the two at the ankle. This makes for easy adjustment for comfort. I hope Teva continues to make these shoes as they are a staple in my active wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: perrymasonaryTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of light use the soles of both shoes separated. The poor quality of this product is a shameful representation how a good product has been sold out to cheap manufacturing to make a buck. Won't buy Teva again.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe - just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: This a great shoe; great traction & thick sole; average weight; rugged. It was just what I wanted for rafting/walking in streams, hiking & heavy yard work for the summer. I wear 7.5 - 8 average width shoe; usually7.5 for a sandal. I got this in an 8 and the left felt quite good but the right rubbed in a place that was aggravating so had to return. Thought about possibly getting a 7 but not sure if that would be too small. Both shipping & return credit were super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Z. G.

customer_reviews.title: Okay Teva Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have owned various Teva sandals in the past. I bought these because I liked the pattern as well as the tread. They do fit well but I find that after a couple of hours wearing them, my feet are starting to ache and the bottom of my feet are beginning to burn. I think this in part is because they're quite stiff and not flexible yet. I'm hoping the more I wear them, the more flexible they will become. Until then, I will wear them intermittently with other shoes to give my feet a break.
customer_reviews.author: Jazwyn

customer_reviews.title: Love the way to adjust shoes to narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bouught was for me and I have a narrow foot and normally wear a 9.5. The shoes fit as good as any and are very comfortable to wear all day. The last pair I bought was for my daughter who also has a narrow foot and usually wears a size 9.5 or 10. She loves the fit and finds them very comfortable. We love the way they are so adjustable no matter how narrow our feet are. Both pairs were ordered as size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha C

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. Had an older pair, slightly different style which are still in great shape, but I wanted another color. They were also an 8. I tend to wear 8.5, 9, and even 9.5 in other shoes (tennis, dress), but 8 is just right for these. Very comfortable right away and I was worried as I have just recently ruptured my plantar fascia (ligament on the bottom of my foot) and need more support, but they provide just the right amount of support. More comfortable than tennis shoes! GREAT SHOE!
customer_reviews.author: Kellye

customer_reviews.title: TEVA need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. If you go to the Lake or River, If you go Boating or Jet Skiing THESE are the only sandals for you to protect your tootsies! Yes, they are pricey, but they last for years-buy a size bigger for kids cuz they adjust and will grow with them and it is hard to wear them out(unlike other brands). We wade, swim, and knock around the dirty, sometimes rocky campsite in these and forget we have shoes on! They rarely come off underwater if you get stuck in mud! They clean well and look good too! PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: Love them. I wear an 8 and ordered an ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I wear an 8 and ordered an 8. I am recovering from a dislocated foot and broken tibia. These give me more support with the straps around my ankles. The bottom of my foot is "waking up" after being immobile for six weeks. These cradle that foot on the bottom. I am happy with them. They are more outdoorsy and sporty.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Teva needs to pay attention to sizing
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I would have wished, but nice looking and sturdy. I had to hand sew in about 2 extra inches of webbing to get the velcro to meet itself and not pull off from the tiny bit of velcro it contacted, otherwise the velcro would have been what you saw first, not the fabric with floral print. I thought from reading other comments that these worked well for a wide foot, but they skimped on the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: J. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 9 1/2 Medium shoe, sometimes a 10. Since these shoes don't come in half sizes, I didn't know which size to order and posted the question online. Several people answered, advising me to go with the size 9. I followed their advice, and am very happy to report the shoes are a perfect fit. The day they came I put them on, expecting to wear them an hour or so to break them in. I ended up wearing them comfortably all day. I am also pleased with the way they look on my feet I totally recommend these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Judith E.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair a long time ago and wore them out. I have been wearing a pair of chaco's lately, but the arch is too high and the bottoms too heavy. Finally gave in and went back to Teva. Love these shoes! comfortable for all day wear. The bottoms are not a flat and light as I remember, so they have more arch support and a more rugged bottom. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: April Shamoun

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for months in the retail stores and been disappointed. Either the quality, the style or the price was not what I was looking for. These shoes are the perfect fit and look. I've been wearing them non stop since they arrived. They are super comfortable and are a true size fit. Thank you Teva. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Wilton

customer_reviews.title: I usually wear 5. 5 size shoes. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 5.5 size shoes. I gave very narrow feet. I ordered the size 6 and I can adjust them to fit my feet. The actual foot area has a lot more room than usual shoes but I haven’t tripped because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Ken & Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Hurricane XLT's. I wear them all the time including in the house as slippers. I wear a size 7 but an 8 is too big. My toes hang slightly over the toe line but the shoes are incredibly comfortable. They can be adjusted with 3 set of straps but this still doesn't help the very slight toe overhang. Very comfortable. Arch support is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: LNMD93

customer_reviews.title: and they are just the greatest things ever if warm weather and water are involved
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for my girls for 10+ years, and they are just the greatest things ever if warm weather and water are involved. Easy to put on, they stay put so well, and they seem to fit nearly every kind of foot (since my three girls all have very different feet). In the adult sizes, they seem to run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: sewgr8nct

customer_reviews.title: Very functional summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable shoe. I live in these during the summer months and I never have to worry about my feet hurting after walking long distances. I even take these on hikes with me and they perform well. I have trekked through river that are moving pretty quickly and had no problems. They aren't the prettiest, but I bought them for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong width mailed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8M. I was sent 8W. Since I have a very narrow foot that is also very thin from top to bottom these sandals look strange on my feet. I would send them back but I am flying out on an international trip that involves hiking on Monday. There would not be enough time to get a size medium. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird Mother

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe for Some
customer_reviews.text: The Teva Hurricane XLT sandal is good for certain shaped feet, but not for mine. I had to return them because the metal fitting on the top near the outside of foot dug painfully into my little toe and the toe next to it. My granddaughter really likes hers, but her foot is not as wide as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water sandal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for sandals to wear in water, like my old Tevas. These were perfect! These did not pinch the bottom of my foot like some of the other styles. All parts of this sandal can handle water. The first day I got them soaked and they dried in the sun within 20 minutes. I normally wear a 7 1/2, I ordered an 8. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Dilandau2

customer_reviews.title: Wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these shoes year round since we moved to Hawaii many years ago. Found my first pair on sale at Ross for $5. They were wonderful, and even though they cost much more than $5, they are worth the price. If you have wide or narrow feet, they fit all. Straps can regulate the width you need. And each pair lasts many years,.
customer_reviews.author: Martha E. R. Eamy

customer_reviews.title: Little different from the older model
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore her last pair of Teva's to death after four years of daily summer wear and summer camp hikes and kayak trips. These have the same fabric and design. The sole is slightly more rugged. She did find that the strap that goes along the back of her heel feels lower than in her old pair. She was able to adjust them to be comfortable, but that still reduced her reaction from ecstasy to simple happiness.
customer_reviews.author: glicker

customer_reviews.title: Love these! It took a few days to break ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! It took a few days to break them in, and I did get some blisters on my first couple of hikes. Excellent tread and "squish" in the heel area- these absorb shock well and feel a bit springy. I just ordered another pair of Tevas in the classic Universal style. I love the look and feel of these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: While I like the shoe I had to return it
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a good quality sandal, nice color and I wanted it to work for me. When I received them I was so excited to start breaking them in, however when I put them on and walked across my bedroom floor I realized they would not work for me. They rubbed my little toe. For the price I did not want to take the chance that after keeping them and trying to break them in that they would work any better. I am sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: L. Albos

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! They match with anything, they are comfortable, and they never fail to bring smiles to everyone's faces--including mine--when I wear them! The only downside is that I am a 7 1/2 in shoes, but since they do not have that size, I went to an 8. If my feet were that big, they would have fit perfectly. But that is of small consequence. I will probably grow in them and wear them out. They are well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock and Dr. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent Mom Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever gotten. Makes me forget that I'm even wearing shoes. Feet still feel okay after a day of walking. One thing is that they do make the dead skin on my heels peel up a bit, but that doesn't really matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: Cadi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for comfort, fit, wearability!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit, the Velcro adjustable straps on all parts of the shoe make it the perfect fit for up to very wide feet! All day comfort, you can stand on your feet all day and still feel like you are walking on clouds! This is my second pair and I love them. I do wish they offered in this style more color options as well as just a basic tan/chocolate color, solid
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Love those Tevas
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend Tevas. They have GREAT arch support. I wear them almost all year long here in Arizona. In winter I just add socks. They are so comfortable!! And consider this. I wore them almost year round for 8+ years. I was going to throw the old pair out. They are Hurricane's too. I like hurricanes because sole upfront is thick..thus rocks keep out of sandals easier. Anyway someone told me about Shoe Goo, sooo I'm gonna fix up the old pair to help the new pair last. Only problem is that I couldn't find a store to sell them locally. Too bad. Oh well Amazon's gain unless some businesses wise up here.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Black

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Teva sandals since they first hit the market and these fit very poorly. I don't know what happened. Perhaps these were a reject at the factory? One foot fits fine and the other shoe is cut too big. The straps are different lengths when comparing left to right. I used to bring these backpacking because they were nice to wear around the campground – good for traction but still comfortable after a hard day of hiking – but the fit is so poor I never feel like I actually have my shoes on quite right. I think I will have to purchase in the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Caramia

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Side strap rubbed a blister.
customer_reviews.text: The side strap by my little toe rubbed a blister immediately. I can’t seem to wear this style of Teva At all so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I actually wear a size 7 1/2 which wasn't offered so I ordered size 8. They fit fine, just slightly larger-nothing bad. They are quite comfortable and the sole is very cushy. I haven't worn them that much yet, only maybe an hour, and they were comfortable. I didn't notice any arch support or lack of. They are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Neesie

customer_reviews.title: Very good support
customer_reviews.text: I'm 68, 5'2" and 200 lbs; have arthritis issues in knees and hips; so I need supportive shoes at all times. These sandals do a good job. I prefer the ease of slip-ons, but the staps help to keep the shoe in place and are quite comfortable. I have not done extensive walking in these. I wear them both with socks and barefoot; both are comfortable, and the adjustability is great.
customer_reviews.author: J R Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have thick ankles and the ankle strap only just fastens on the Velcro, but otherwise everything is good. Would suggest they make the ankle strap an inch longer for us older people
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking sandal EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of sandals for an upcoming Alaska cruise. I wear a 7 1/2, and these only come in whole sizes. Since I prefer my sandals to be secure and not floppy, I went with the 7. It fits perfectly. These shoes are the the most comfortable shoes I own and they will be great for deck wear on the ship as well as walking in port towns, if it's sandal weather.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach and amusement parks.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these to lego land florida in very hot weather for two das and around Siesta key beach. Went on water rides as well. They were comfortable and I didn't get any blisters. Only issue I'm having is the band is fraying a little bit where the pattern is.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn V.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: After 6 weeks of part time wear (after the return time had ended), the inner sole pulled away from the casing of the shoe. No longer wearable. Highly disappointed as other Tevas have lasted me for years.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Glasmann

customer_reviews.title: not the quality of previous tevas
customer_reviews.text: 1. even though they are adjustable, my 7.5C foot slides forward in this sandal. 2. the straps are not quite long enough over the instep. 3. the straps have started to fray after only 3 wearings! not acceptable. though they have less tread, I will go back to the teva original universal as soon as they are available in an acceptable color in my size.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these lightly for 1 year before the layers of the sole separated. I am 60 years old and have not subjected them to any stress. I would love to return them, but cannot find that option.
customer_reviews.author: Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He wears a men's size 7.5 shoe, which wasn't available. A similar men's Teva in size 8 was too large--both too long and too wide. The size chart led me to try this sandal, but it was too small. I returned it and bought the same sandal in a women's size 9.
customer_reviews.author: ACTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: They make work fine for some people
customer_reviews.text: These Tevas are very heavy rugged on the soles in comparison to the straps - I found them to be a bit unbalanced in purpose and structure. They make work fine for some people, but they work did not for me.
customer_reviews.author: eliz

customer_reviews.title: No protection on straps
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are totally adjustable. They can be made to fit one half size larger if need be. The biggest problem is the lack of protection on the straps. They rubbed my foot when I walked at the ankle and across the top of the instep. The bare nylon straps are rough on the edges and rub my skin as my feet move in them. I had a pair with a pad at these points before and did not realize how uncomfortable this is. I returned these and ordered Teva Terra Fi Lite instead. The difference in price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jkgolf

customer_reviews.title: Finally a decent pair of Tevas that don't cost an arm & leg!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a pair of Tevas for years, but just couldn't justify the cost of some of them and I just couldn't find a pair I liked until now. These are kinda neutral and they fit great! Can't wait to get another pair!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A multi-functional shoe--well made and good fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes (lost the first pair) and I love them for crossing streams, steaming in hot tubs, around swimming pools and other types of water activities. But, they are also comfie to wear around the house (with thin socks). I have had toenail surgery several times, and these shoes made recovery much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fit well even though just a tad wide
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a pair and she loves them. I have a morton's neuroma and I thought they would be cushy enough for my feet that they wouldn't hurt my neuroma. Unfortunately, the padding is not enough for my sensitive feet. I wear them for washing the car or working around the yard when watering plants, etc, but I can not wear them for any duration of time. My foot starts to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Sukie

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable straps.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Teva sandals for many years, and bought these after the soles on my last pair wore out. I was very disappointed and will have to return them. The top strap is very stiff and sharp, and has already cut through my skin the first time I wore them. I am planning to get another style. I hope this is particular to this style, and not indicative of a reduced quality of Teva products.
customer_reviews.author: Malaki

customer_reviews.title: a good sandal for the price
customer_reviews.text: comfortable leisure sandal! Hugs the foot nicely. Feels sturdy. I took them out camping and got some compliments. I tried to go hiking in them, but they do not provide enough support for me personally. My feet were killing me after a few hours. So maybe they aren't meant for that. The cloth woven material started fraying by week 3. All in all a good sandal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gravalop

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. Had a pair for 8yrs which finally wore out. I wear them everywhere. They are good hikers especially along the ocean. Plan to buy another pair in a different color or maybe 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: The best athletic sandal money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Superior Quality and the sole is exceptional and great support for walking. I expect these to last me at least a decade or more. Very solid and oh so comfortable. Perfect with shorts, slacks and casual skirt or dress.
customer_reviews.author: L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and good for hiking around water
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these sandals. They are comfortable and good for hiking around water. Initial wearing did cause blisters, so using moleskin or allowing for a break-in period before wearing them all day on a water hike is a good idea. They look nice and are sturdily made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not whatt hey use to be!
customer_reviews.text: This brand has gone downhill! Teva was my favorite, almost only shoe i have worn for the past 10 years, sadly they are not the same. Its like wearing plastic on your feet. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Good sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this style because of the reviews stating what great arch support it has. Yes, they're good, (the best I've been able to find!), but not quite as supportive as I had hoped. I'm keeping them because I haven't found anything better. I bought them to wear on a walking tour so I hope they suffice, but I really need a higher arch and a deeper heel cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope history repeats for this product.
customer_reviews.text: exactly what was expected and so far they are performing as expected. This pair replaces ones that were 13 years old and one sandal floated away from a Hawaii beach recently while on vacation. Expect this pair to provide similar satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: These are insanely comfortable for people like me that are not Chaco fans
customer_reviews.text: These are insanely comfortable for people like me that are not Chaco fans. No toe strap, no hard foot bed. I really love these sandals and I have put them through the ringer. I am on the river and hiking frequently.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Tevas--A Great Rugged Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Hazel/Black and really liked the way they looked. As always, they also fit perfectly. These are perfect for the beach, kayaking and walking. They are always comfortable for whatever activity I choose. I also like that they can be washed. I do not put them in the dryer though. I just let them air dry outside in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Diane MC

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal ever made
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these sandals for years, as a river guide. I wear them everywhere, and the footbed is comfortable and the straps are all adjustable. The best rugged sandal, there is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable foot bed
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size nine ordered size nine and it fits perfectly! Super comfortable foot bed. I got these for kayaking. I like the thicker soles with good traction. Limited straps allow sand and pebbles to flow through without getting trapped in the shoe. These are a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Wingler

customer_reviews.title: Long last Iasting and work great for plantar fasciitis people !
customer_reviews.text: Ive had my last pair of the same style for over 8 years . They lasted many long hikes and waking thru creeks . I love the old ones still but they began to come unglued from the inside sole but still work fine .
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!  Just as good as my other 2 pairs of Teva's.
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of sandals like these and they are so comfortable, just like the others! Fit perfect for the size. I wear a size 10 and these in a 10 were perfect! Comfortable from day 1. No spots that rub like others had mentioned in their reviews. None of myTeva's rub anywhere and they are the most comfortable sandals I own! Just want more color selection!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Yost

customer_reviews.title: I Wear Them All The Time
customer_reviews.text: When these sandals came, I was rather disappointed. I bought them to replace a pair of very old, well loved Tevas. When I put them on they seemed somewhat larger than what I was used to but when I walked in the they were a dream. I put them on and have not stopped wearing them all month. They have been very comfortable and have surprisingly good support.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Mann

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good support
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable, but I think they will take gradual breaking in. However, I know others who have these and swear by them!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Hassle Free Return for Correct Size
customer_reviews.text: Had to return for a smaller size, as Tevas run large. Return was hassle-free, so still giving a 5-star cuz I love Tevas! (Order one size smaller than your closed-shoe size, unless you like a really big foot bed!)
customer_reviews.author: Lark Tucker

customer_reviews.title: yay  :)
customer_reviews.text: i love these :) i somehow lost my old pair and ended up buying a cheaper/ lesser brand last year. they werent as comfortable or as good looking as these. im very happy with this purchase. im sure they'll last me several summers of hiking, swimming and camping. I recommend this brand to anyone who's serious about enjoying the great outdoors and being comfortable while doing so :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Teva sandals. My first reaction to wearing thems was disbelief at how comfortable they feel on the feet. The soles look hard, but feel like you are wearing a great pair of cushioned sneakers. Very comfortable for all day wearing around the house or out and about. My only reason for giving these less than five stars is the fact they seem to run a tad large. I typically wear a 9, but I could have easily gotten an 8.5 without having my toes run off the front end. Just the same, these sandals are comfortable and fit securely with the velcro straps at the toes and ankles. I will enjoy them this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mayne

customer_reviews.title: great crick-walkin' shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8.5 but only whole sizes were offered, so I purchased a 9. They look a little long but feel absolutely fine. I'd say these fit true to size. These shoes are super comfortable and do adjust to my widish foot. Very nice footbed and arch support! The design on the straps is attractive. Took them out in the water the same day I received them and they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: N Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Teva Women's Water Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was the correct fit and it gave me the support and cushioning I was looking for when walking for exercise in a swimming pool. I would highly recommend it for that activity. I have only worn it 3 times and will be wearing it every time I walk in the pool. I had been wearing the Speedo water shoe which was ok but it is an enclosed shoe and the Teva is a sandal which I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Abigal

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for my camping trip & ordered them last minute. Arrived next day, exactly as pictured, they fit amazing and I have narrow feet! No issues or problems in very hot weather:)
customer_reviews.author: D W

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals
customer_reviews.text: Teva sandals are awesome. I wear them almost constantly all summer. I walk my dogs in them, work in the garden and wear them till the sun goes down and I can't work outside anymore. They last for years. I just had to recycle two pairs that I'd had for at least 6 years. I tried another brand but they didn't hold up. I went back to Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: Raefur

customer_reviews.title: Sizes vary.
customer_reviews.text: The tevas are great, just too large. My old ones are an 8, and so were these, but the new ones run bigger. I am returning them and ordering a size 7.
customer_reviews.author: maryleam

customer_reviews.title: Teva Women's Hurrican XLTSandal
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal. This is my second pair. Very comfortable and I can walk a long time in them. They are able to be adjusted to with strap around the front of the sandal, and then around the top of the foot. I make them tighter when going for a walk for exercise, and then loosen them for wearing around the house.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Long time TEVA wearer
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing TEVAS for about 15 years or so I absolutely love them they're the most comfortable sandals I've ever owned I have owned five pairs in the past years the BLACK ones I just purchased are my wear with any outfit I also own a pair of green ones and a pair of blue ones that sadly to say are wearing out
customer_reviews.author: Sarahb

customer_reviews.title: love teva hurricane shoes
customer_reviews.text: love teva hurricane shoes, wear as sandals ,water shoes. they give good support and best of very comfortable ,this is my 4th pair
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. McGlothlin

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty wide feet, so I ordered a size up and they fit perfectly! I just need to wear them awhile to break in the straps because they're just a smidge snug(how they should be). I'm excited to take these camping with me.
customer_reviews.author: Bri De

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.  Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Teva quality has diminished over the past few years. These sandals were cheaply made, without padding under the straps. I bought the same size as I usually do and they were too tight on my right forefoot to the point that I gave them to my son. He developed blisters on his feet from them. Disappointing. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Jen

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sandals!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Teva! I have had 2 pair previously and wore both out- took 20 years to do. I am absolutely delighted with my new pair. My feet are very wide but because they are so adjustable they fit perfectly. I used to be able to find them in local stores, but the outdoor retailers near me don't carry this basic model any more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Weird all over
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are off in many areas: They are hard with ridges that pinch the bottom of my foot. The toes area is huge. Plastic triangles have no padding and dig into the foot. Kind of short in the heel. See my other reviews of Teva
customer_reviews.author: Soph6

product_meta.title: Teva Women's Hurricane XLT - Hazel/Black
product_meta.description: Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.
feature_bullets: Athletic sandal featuring padded heel strap and adjustable hook-and-loop closures
Treated with Microban, a zinc-based antimicrobial technology that helps prevent stink
